name: Space Hop: helix jump space
description:
Check this arcade! Probably the funniest and most addictive mobile game ever!

Choose your favourite character! Will it be a funny pigeon, angry granny, or pixel craft man? It's up to you.

- Rush through the deep space with the force of your jet
- Shoot the magic powder and fly away!
- Take the hot chili pepper and see what happens
- Collect all unique hidden characters!
- Be aware of pills. You don't need to cure yourself
- Fly as high as possible!
- Unique jet game mechanics

Do you like jokes, funny characters and endless space? This game is for you!
Take an outer space ride, like you have a jetpack!

Thank you for playing our games. Leave your comments and help us to improve it for you!
